alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:17PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Columbia, northeastern Suwannee and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 417 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Live Oak to near Lake City. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Live Oak, White Springs, Suwannee Springs, Wellborn, Five Points, Watertown, Winfield, Suwannee Valley and Houston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee
